name: Tmux
title: The tmux cheat sheet quick reference of most commonly used shortcuts and commands

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: The tmux cheat sheet quick reference of most commonly used shortcuts and commands

cards.title: New session
cards.body:
Start a new session

```shell script
$ tmux
```

Start a new named session

```shell script
$ tmux new -s myname
```

Show all sessions

```shell script
$ tmux ls
```

cards.title: Attach session
cards.body:
Attach to last session

```shell script
$ tmux a
```

Attach to named

```shell script
$ tmux a -t myname
```

cards.title: Config
cards.body:
Reload config

```shell script
$ tmux source-file ~/.tmux.conf
```

Show config

```shell script
$ tmux show-options -g
```

cards.title: Getting started
cards.body:
| Shortcuts | Description | | ------------ | ------------------ | | `Ctrl+b` `?` | List all shortcuts |
Show every session, window, pane, etc. ```shell script $ tmux info ```

cards.title: Session (Set of Windows)
cards.body:
| -                    | -                              |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `Ctrl+b` `d`         | <red>Detach from session</red> |
| `Ctrl+b` `s`         | Show all sessions              |
| `Ctrl+b` `$`         | Rename session                 |
| `Ctrl+b` `(` _/_ `)` | Previous/Next session          |

cards.title: Resizing
cards.body:
| Command             | Description  |
| ------------------- | ------------ |
| `resize-pane -D 20` | Resize down  |
| `resize-pane -U 20` | Resize up    |
| `resize-pane -L 20` | Resize left  |
| `resize-pane -R 20` | Resize right |

cards.title: Listing
cards.body:
| Command        | Description  |
| -------------- | ------------ |
| `list-keys`    | All commands |
| `list-panes`   | All panes    |
| `list-windows` | All Windows  |

cards.title: Copying
cards.body:
| Command              | Description      |
| -------------------- | ---------------- |
| `list-buffers`       | List all buffers |
| `show-buffer`        | Show #0 contents |
| `capture-pane`       | Copy of pane     |
| `choose-buffer`      | Show and paste   |
| `save-buffer a.txt`  | Save to file     |
| `delete-buffer -b 1` | Delete buffer 1  |

cards.title: Setting
cards.body:
| Command                | Description          |
| ---------------------- | -------------------- |
| `set -g OPTION`        | Set for all sessions |
| `setw -g OPTION`       | Set for all windows  |
| `setw -g mode-keys vi` | Enable vi-mode       |
| `set -g prefix C-a`    | Set prefix           |

cards.title: Misc
cards.body:
| Command                  | Description  |
| ------------------------ | ------------ |
| `swap-pane -s 3 -t 1`    | Swap pane    |
| `swap-window -t -1`      | Move to left |
| `setw synchronize-panes` | Sync Panes   |
| `join-pane -t :#`        | Join pane    |
